snippet.title: Interrogation: You will be deceived - Release Date Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
As a police detective tasked with bringing down a dangerous terrorist group, you fight on two fronts: interrogating suspects & managing your team and its reputation. With time running out, how far will you go to stop these criminals? Manipulation, threats or even torture? Does the end justify the means?

Coming for PC, Mac and Linux December 5, 2019
for Nintendo Switch 2020

Wishlist now on:
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1016770/Interrogation/
GOG.com: https://www.gog.com/game/interrogation_you_will_be_deceived
Humble Store: https://www.humblebundle.com/store/interrogation-you-will-be-deceived

Investigate at:
Website: http://www.interrogation-game.com/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/InterrogationG
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/InterrogationG
Discord: https://www.discord.gg/mixtvision

#InterrogationGame #indiegame
